definitions.body: intoxioating drink, strong drink (Ba:NB § 71);—alw. ´[[שׁ]]: abs.; usu. ‖[[וַיִן ]] (exc. Ps 69:13): Is 29:8; usu. condemned, Is 5:11, Is 5:22, Is 28:7, Is 28:7, Is 28:7, Is 56:12 (´[[נִסְבְּאָה שׁ]]:), Mic 2:11, 1Sa 1:15, Pr 20:1; forbidden to priests on duty Le 10:9 (P) ; not for princes Pr 31:4; nor Nazirite Nu 6:3, Ju Jdg 13:4, Jdg 13:7, Jdg 13:14, cf. ´[[חׂמֶץ שׁ]]: Nu 6:3; ´[[שׁוֹתֵי שׁ]]: Ps 69:13 drunkards; but ´[[שׁ]]: as common drink De 29:5 (opp. to miraculous), allowable in sacrif. meal De 14:26, commended for weak and weary Pr 31:4; ´[[נֶסֶךְ שׁ]]: Nu 28:7(P; for [[יַיִן]] v:Nu 28:14); v. further Kennedy:Ency. Bib. iv. 5309 f.—On form cf. Lag:M ii. 357; BN 51.
